List of all members.

Detailed Description

Kernel world coordinate system.

A KernelWcs object is a specialised form of a World Coordinate System object that is initialised by transforming a grid of test points with tcspk to generate the transformations.

The KernelWcs constructor takes a snapshot of the running system to construct the world coordinate transformation.

Parameters:
vt  Mount virtual telescope
roll  Actual roll of mount
pitch  Actual pitch of mount
rma  Actual rotator mechanical angle
aoa  Actual optics tip
aob  Actual optics tilt
refsys  World coordinate reference system
wavel  Effective wavelength
trans  Focal plane to instrument transformation
centre  Center of sample grid (inst coords)
gridsize  Sample grid size (inst coords)
